ISSUE.TITLE: DynamoDB Connection failing with "__init__() got an unexpected keyword argument 'min_insert_date'"
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hello, I have an issue connecting Redash to my DynamoDB table in AWS. ### Issue Summary I have the follow issue when I test my DynamoDB connection : `Error running query: __init__() got an unexpected keyword argument 'min_insert_date'` If I go to the logs of the worker, I have the following : ``` [2017-05-03 10:17:11,169: INFO/Worker-15] redash.tasks.execute_query[524b9ba4-1b53-47fc-95e3-346f6ee765]: task=execute_query state=executing_query query_hash=15dd79f96b76332149298a920e9d97 type=dynamodb_sql ds_id=1 task_id=524b9ba4-1b53-47fc-953-345b6f6ee7 queue=queries query_id=adhoc username=test@mail.com worker_1 | [2017-05-03 10:17:11,217: WARNING/Worker-15] Unexpected error while running query: worker_1 | Traceback (most recent call last): worker_1 | File "/app/redash/tasks/queries.py", line 421, in run worker_1 | data, error = query_runner.run_query(annotated_query, self.user) worker_1 | File "/app/redash/query_runner/dynamodb_sql.py", line 98, in run_query worker_1 | engine = self._connect() worker_1 | File "/app/redash/query_runner/dynamodb_sql.py", line 85, in _connect worker_1 | engine.connect(**config) worker_1 | File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/dql/engine.py", line 114, in connect worker_1 | self.connection = DynamoDBConnection.connect(*args, **kwargs) worker_1 | File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/dynamo3/connection.py", line 194, in connect worker_1 | return cls(client, **kwargs) worker_1 | TypeError: __init__() got an unexpected keyword argument 'min_insert_date' ``` - [x] I checked that all the python and node dependencies were installed and up-to-date. - [x] I tried to connect to another database (mongodb) and it worked fine. ### Steps to Reproduce 1. I added a data source, configured the connection, entered the access/secret keys and region. 2. I clicked on the **Test Connection** button ### Technical details: * Redash Version: 1.0.3 * Browser/OS: Chrome/OS X 10.11.6 * How did you install Redash: with Docker, following this tutorial : https://redash.io/help-onpremise/dev/docker.html

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #1700 from deecay/plotly-bump Change: upgrade Plotly.js.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix: properties of data source were not reset when changing type. Fixes #1748.
Fix: properties of data source were not reset when changing type. Fixes #1748.
